casebody.data:
99-0510 (La. 4/1/99)

Richard LAY and Similarly Situated v. LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION/PAROLE, Louisiana Parole Board. No. 99-CI-0510. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Lay, Richard; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of East Baton Rouge 19th Judicial District Court Div. “J” Number 444,131; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Number CA98 1491, CW98 2177

Denied.

LEMMON, J. not on panel.
